title: TSP Final Report
description: Comprehensive report on the Transitional Stabilisation Programme (TSP), including achievements, challenges, and lessons learned.

title: NDS1 Mid-Term Review
description: Mid-term evaluation of the National Development Strategy 1 (NDS1), outlining progress, challenges, and adjustments for the remaining period.

title: NDS2 Blueprint
description: Framework for the National Development Strategy 2 (NDS2), outlining key objectives, focus areas, and implementation strategies.

title: Vision 2030 Strategy
description: Comprehensive document outlining Zimbabwe's Vision 2030, including strategic pillars, objectives, and implementation framework.

title: NDS1 Communication Strategy
description: Strategy for communicating NDS1 to citizens, stakeholders, and the diaspora, including social media campaigns and engagement activities.

title: Vision 2030 Citizen's Guide
description: Simplified guide to Vision 2030, TSP, and NDS1 for citizens, including key objectives, achievements, and participation opportunities.

title: Agricultural Policy Framework
description: Policy framework for the agricultural sector, outlining strategies to boost productivity and ensure food security.

title: Mining Sector Development Plan
description: Development plan for the mining sector, outlining strategies to increase mineral exports and attract investment.

title: Tourism Development Strategy
description: Strategy for developing the tourism sector, outlining plans to attract more visitors and increase revenue.

title: Infrastructure Development Plan
description: Plan for developing infrastructure, including roads, railways, and energy infrastructure.

title: Health Sector Strategic Plan
description: Strategic plan for the health sector, outlining strategies to improve healthcare access and quality.

title: Education Sector Development Plan
description: Development plan for the education sector, outlining strategies to improve access to quality education.

title: Renewable Energy Policy
description: Policy framework for promoting renewable energy sources, including solar, wind, and hydro power.

title: ICT Development Plan
description: Plan for developing the ICT sector, outlining strategies to improve internet access and digital literacy.

title: SME Development Strategy
description: Strategy for supporting small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), outlining plans to improve access to finance and markets.

title: Climate Change Policy
description: Policy framework for addressing climate change, outlining strategies to reduce emissions and adapt to climate impacts.
